page.title: 16Activities in Hereford.
page.content: Hereford is a very nice place. There is a lot to do and there are plenty of sports shops where you can buy gear. There is a park called{Bishop's Meadow and we have the{King George V Playing {Fields.}At the back of the fields there's a Bandstand where Breakdancers go sometimes.{Breakdancing}is a kind of dance which was invented in America to stop fighting. I like{jogging}and I go{swimming.}My friend goes to{Kung Fu,}a martial art, and{Karate.}There are some{Discos, like the Vortex, where you can dance and listen to pop music. We even have a{Snooker Centre. My friend Daniel is a{Scout.}There are 12 troops in the city for boys from 11 to 16 years. Dan goes on Thursdays from 7.30 p.m. to 9 p.m. and pays 15p a week. He thinks it's great!
